name: 6 Vintage Eames Era Libbey Shot Glasses: Turquiose and Silver Fish Pattern
description: Six perfectly intact Eames era shot glasses from Libbey in the 1950's with an excellent little fish design. These classy little glasses will hold your poison of choice in style. All six glasses are in excellent condition, no chips or scratches, silver brims are all perfectly intact. Glasses measure 4 1/2" high by about 2" across the top. Returns for any damage incurred during shipping must be made with in two weeks. Buyers are responsible for all shipping. Since all materials used at QUIET HOUSES come from second hand sources, please note it may take time to replace a rare or antique glass. If a glass can not be replaced a refund or store credit can be issued. All items are shipped with insurance and delivery confirmation. International buyers please send a message for shipping qoute. *QUIET HOUSES is based in Northampton MA, local buyers should send a message to arrange for alternate delivery options. *Combined shipping is not an option for most items, especially glass items since they require so much care. If two items seem like they could be safely combined, send a message and it can be looked into. Pin It

name: Vintage: Three Square Amber Decanters
description: Nothing says class like decanted booze especially with this set of 3 square shaped amber decanters. One each for your whiskey, gin and brandy. In absolute excellent condition, minimal scratching on the bottoms only, no chips or cracks. Rubber stops all perfectly intact. Each bottle measures 3" x 3" wide/deep, by 5 1/2" tall for the well and 7 3/4" tall with stopper in place. Woo your guests with your excellent taste in liquor and glassware. name: Vintage Turquoise Blendo Glassware: Frosted Pitcher and 6 Glasses
description: Impress your guests with a special cocktail recipe served up in this classic vintage set! This set comes from the West Virginia Glass Co. Blendo line of glass ware, popular during the 50's & 60's. The set includes a nice tall pitcher and 6 glasses, all in a turquoise frost that fades up into clear glass and tops off in a gold rim. All pieces are in great shape, only a small scratch on the side of the pitcher, all gold rimming is intact. Pitcher is 8 3/4" tall, glasses are 3 1/4" tall. International buyers please send a message for shipping quote. Returns for any damage incurred during shipping must be made with in two weeks. Buyers are responsible for all shipping.
